scripts.build: cd apps/main & yarn build & cd apps/shop & yarn build
scripts.start: cd apps/main & yarn start & cd apps/shop & yarn start
scripts.test: cd apps/main & yarn test & cd apps/shop & yarn test
scripts.test:watch: cd apps/main & yarn test:watch & cd apps/shop & yarn test:watch
scripts.test:cov: cd apps/main & yarn test:cov & cd apps/shop & yarn test:cov
scripts.lint: cd apps/main & yarn lint & cd apps/shop & yarn lint
scripts.fix: cd apps/main & yarn fix & cd apps/shop & yarn fix
scripts.prettier: cd apps/main & yarn prettier & cd apps/shop & yarn prettier
scripts.format: cd apps/main & yarn format & cd apps/shop & yarn format
scripts.lint-staged: cd apps/main & yarn lint-staged & cd apps/shop & yarn lint-staged
scripts.lint-staged --concurrent false: cd apps/main & yarn lint-staged --concurrent false & cd apps/shop & yarn lint-staged --concurrent false
scripts.prepare: cd apps/main & yarn prepare & cd apps/shop & yarn prepare
scripts.cy: cd apps/main & yarn cy & cd apps/shop & yarn cy
scripts.cyr: cd apps/main & yarn cyr & cd apps/shop & yarn cyr
scripts.storybook: cd apps/main & yarn storybook & cd apps/shop & yarn storybook
scripts.build-storybook: cd apps/main & yarn build-storybook & cd apps/shop & yarn build-storybook
